name: Experimental Fighter System
desc: Experimental System developed for the experimental fighter plane, Lynx by Dr. Christine Forstner of the research and development department.

name: Melody Reactor Engine
desc: Allows the installation of Special Engine Reactor developed by the research and development department with enhanced fuel-burning.

name: Auroran Engineering
desc: When deployed in combat, grants %s/%s/%s/%s hitpoint regeneration, depending on this ship's hull size.

name: Military Specification
desc: This ship have been extensively modified up to the Auroran Navy standards whom preferred survivability and increased flux capacity for extended combat. Such as %s/%s/%s/%s flux capacity rate and an increased of %s/%s/%s/%s ship armor. However all the upgrades have mostly weighted the ship down to a certain extent of the ship's maneuverability.

name: Automata Specification
desc: The Expeditionary Automata Forces typically requires their ships to be in tip top shape and even specifically modified to be used by their autonomous robotic forces. Thanks to the the integration of AI cores into the ship systems, a lot of things can be taken off in exchange for %s/%s/%s/%s flux dissipation rate. The engines and thrusters were also enhanced, giving up to %s/%s/%s/%s for top speed, acceleration and overall maneuverability. Such extensive modifications have forced this ship to strip up considerable portion of its armor as compensation for the upgrades.

name: Linked Engine
desc: This module houses the main engine of the ship, with dozens of engine exhausts to generate enough thrusts for the whole ship.

name: Linked Hangar
desc: The hangar of this module can be controlled by the main ship module through mirroring the main ship command. The main ship has to have wing controls or the fighters would be on defensive mode around the ship.

name: Decentralized Engines
desc: The main engine of this ship is located on separate ship modules, both contributing to the speed and total maneuverability of this ship. Losing one operational engine exhaust might affect the ship maneuverability greatly.

name: Improved Flagship System
desc: The main flagship of UAF Fleet, with improved systems and efficiency, equipped with best of the best materials from UAF Military.

name: Flagship Electronic Warfare Deflector System
desc: The ECCM System implanted to the flagship of UAF Fleet, producing a massive counter electronic warfare measure with possibilities to launch the fleet's own electronic warfare capabilities.

name: Flagship Extended Hangar
desc: The flagship's hangar, manned by the most trained crew, cuts down the replacement rate of airborne fighters by about 30%, improving its efficiency and capabilities.

name: Flagship Armour Plating
desc: Improved armour plating of the flagship vulnerable modules.

name: Increased Explosion
desc: Fragile cargo ship, may cause bigger explosion than ordinary ones.

name: Eyeseau Improved Electronic Warfare
desc: The improvements made especially for the Eyeseau Ship, improving almost everything regarding the ECCM and ECM Package.

name: Eyeseau Improved Intelligence Equipment
desc: Improvements made especially for the Eyeseau Ship on the Surveying and Intelligence Equipment, also adds the modernized quantum equipments.

name: Eyeseau Centralized Communication
desc: Improvements for the Eyeseau to make it able to act as a centralized communication ships, installing essential and extended communication equipments.
